text: Earth Shrine

Beware the evils of 
greed! Act quickly,
think on your feet,

and you will be 
rewarded.

Do not come in here!
You are not wanted.

I am Llort, and this is
my shrine! All mine!

text:
At last, you got a 
compass! You can use it
to warp to the shrine

entrance anywhere on 
the world map. Find it
on the status screen.

text:
Hey-di-hee, who-thee
-be, you're no friend
to us down here!

You've learned the 
Jade Ring spell!

Whoo who! Oh whee,
what do we have here?
A human person's

coming close!
Why, what a great
event! Whoo who!

text:
Llort, I couldn't stop
her! Uh, get ready to
fight!

text:
Ugh. I thought I was
alone here. Llort! An
enemy is in your cave.

text:
I said this is my cave,
mine! This is the Shrine
of Earth and I am

Llort! Go away, take
nothing, it's all mine!

Hey, Llort, watch out!
She's coming!

Aren't you an enemy of
my boss, Llort?!
You can't come in here!

text:
You've been taking my
things! Put them back!
Don't touch anything!
Those are all my gems!

Congratulations, Zelda,
you have prevailed!
Hurry, now. You must

travel to a place of
festival. Rumour tells it
is found by the great

forest to the north.
And remember; all is 
not what it seems.
